short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flips a coin the specified number of times

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you torn between two spots for dinner? Are your family, friends, and/or significant other hopelessly indecisive? Do you wish to solve all of life's problems with the flip of a coin? Look no further! This automatic coin simulator will flip a coin for you as many times as you'd like and give you a report on the results!
